headline: Vistra Declares Dividend on Common Stock and Series A Preferred Stock
summary: IRVING, Texas, Feb. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Vistra announced today that its board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.2235 per share of Vistra's common stock, reflecting an...
